alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 1:01AM EDT until June 14 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM EDT FOR JACKSON COUNTY... At 101 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chelsea to near Vandercook Lake to near Litchfield, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Norvell... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Parma... Hanover... Oak Point... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... Munith... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
